isa%22%3EMerisa%3C%2Fa%3E+in+Afrika.+Industriell+produziertes+glutenfreies+Bier+wird+nach+modernen+Brauverfahren+hergestellt+und+orientiert+sich+geschmacklich+oft+an+handels%C3%BCblichen+Bieren.%3Csup+id%3D%22cite_ref-%3A0_27-1%22+class%3D%22reference%22%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22%23cite_note-%3A0-27%22%3E%5B27%5D%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fsup%3E+Solche+Biere+werden+von+kleinen+Brauereien+als+%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fwiki%2FMarktnische%22+title%3D%22Marktnische%22%3EMarktnische%3C%2Fa%3E+gebraut.%3C%2Fp%3E%0A%3Ch3%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22mw-headline%22+id%3D%22Werbung_zu_gesundheitsbezogenen_Wirkungen%22%3EWerbung+zu+gesundheitsbezogenen+Wirkungen%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22mw-editsection%22%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22mw-editsection-bracket%22%3E%5B%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fw%2Findex.php%3Ftitle%3DBier%26amp%3Bveaction%3Dedit%26amp%3Bsection%3D27%22+class%3D%22mw-editsection-visualeditor%22+title%3D%22Abschnitt+bearbeiten%3A+Werbung+zu+gesundheitsbezogenen+Wirkungen%22%3EBearbeiten%3C%2Fa%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22mw-editsection-divider%22%3E+%7C+%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fw%2Findex.php%3Ftitle%3DBier%26amp%3Baction%3Dedit%26amp%3Bsection%3D27%22+title%3D%22Abschnitt+bearbeiten%3A+Werbung+zu+gesundheitsbezogenen+Wirkungen%22%3EQuelltext+bearbeiten%3C%2Fa%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22mw-editsection-bracket%22%3E%5D%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fh3%3E%0A%3Cp%3EDas+%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fwiki%2FLandgericht_Berlin%22+title%3D%22Landgericht+Berlin%22%3ELandgericht+Berlin%3C%2Fa%3E+hat+dem+%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fwiki%2FDeutscher_Brauer-Bund%22+title%3D%22Deutscher+Brauer-Bund%22%3EDeutschen+Brauer-Bund%3C%2Fa%3E+e.%26%23160%3BV.+%28DBB%29+auf+Klage+der+%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fwiki%2FVerbraucherzentralen%22+class%3D%22mw-redirect%22+title%3D%22Verbraucherzentralen%22%3EVerbraucherzentralen%3C%2Fa%3E+in+einem+Wettbewerbsprozess+untersagt%2C+mit+positiven+gesundheitsbezogenen+Wirkungen+von+alkoholischen+Getr%C3%A4nken+zu+werben.+Der+DBB+hatte+auf+seiner+Internetseite+behauptet%2C+Bier+habe+eine+sch%C3%B6nheitsf%C3%B6rdernde+ ure%3Dfiles%252F136022384%252FPh.d._2015_Adam_Hyllested.pdf%22%3EHyllested%2C+Adam.+Word+Exchange+at+the+Gates+of+Europe%3A+Five+Millennia+of+Language+Contact.+University+of+Copenhagen+2014%3C%2Fa%3E+%7C%7C%7C+Zitat%3A+%22%3Ci%3E...+the+etymon+is+also+known+from+the+Bulgarian+grey+drink+%3Cb%3Ebuz%C3%A1%3C%2Fb%3E+%E2%80%98a+grey+kvaslike+drink%E2%80%99%2C+borrowed+by+Turkish+and+perhaps+the+source+of+Eng.+%3Cb%3Ebooze%3C%2Fb%3E+via+Romani+%28cf.+also+Chagatai%2C+Osmannic+Turkic+etc.+%3Cb%3Eboza%3C%2Fb%3E+%E2%80%98drink+made+of+camel%E2%80%99s+milk%E2%80%99+and+Chuv.+%3Cb%3Epora%3C%2Fb%3E%2C+its+%3Cb%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fwiki%2FOghurische_Sprachen%22+title%3D%22Oghurische+Sprachen%22%3Er-Turkic%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fb%3E+counterpart%2C+which+may+ultimately+the+source+of+the+Gmc.+%3Cb%3Ebeer%3C%2Fb%3E-word%29.+Quite+remarkably%2C+Mod.Gr.+%3Cb%3E%CE%BC%CF%80%CE%BF%CF%8D%CE%B6%CE%B1%3C%2Fb%3E%2C+obviously+a+late+loan%2C+means+%E2%80%98water+elder%E2%80%99+%E2%80%93+either+it+is+a+South+Slavic+loan+although+South+Slavic+forms+seem+to+reflect+only+%3Cb%3E%2Ab%D1%8Az%D1%8A%3C%2Fb%3E+%E2%80%93+or+it+is+directly+from+Turkish+with+a+meaning+not+attested+there%2C+having+replaced+the+name+for+the+same+plant+as+in+Slavic+earlier+in+history.%3C%2Fi%3E%22%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fli%3E%0A%3Cli+id%3D%22cite_note-5%22%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22mw-cite-backlink%22%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22%23cite_ref-5%22%3E%E2%86%91%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+class%3D%22reference-text%22%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fwiki%2FFranz_Meu%25C3%259Fdoerffer_%28Biochemiker%29%22+title%3D%22Franz+Meu%C3%9Fdoerffer+%28Biochemiker%29%22%3EFranz+Meu%C3%9Fdoerffer%3C%2Fa%3E%2C+Martin+Zarnkow%3A+%3Ci%3EDas+Bier%3A+Eine+Geschichte+von+Hopfen+und+Malz.%3C%2Fi%3E+C.H.+Beck+Verlag%2C+2014%2C+%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fwiki%2FSpezial%3AISBN-Suche%2F9783406666674%22+class%3D%22internal+mw-magiclink-isbn%22%3EISBN+978-3-406-66667-4%3C%2Fa%3E%2C+S.+35.%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fli%3E%0A%3Cli+id%3D%22cite_note-6%22%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22mw-cite-backlink%22%3E%3Ca+href%3D% isch%22+lang%3D%22fa%22+hreflang%3D%22fa%22+class%3D%22interlanguage-link-target%22%3E%D9%81%D8%A7%D8%B1%D8%B3%DB%8C%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli+class%3D%22interlanguage-link+interwiki-fi%22%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Ffi.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2FOlut%22+title%3D%22Olut+%E2%80%93+Finnisch%22+lang%3D%22fi%22+hreflang%3D%22fi%22+class%3D%22interlanguage-link-target%22%3ESuomi%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli+class%3D%22interlanguage-link+interwiki-fiu-vro%22%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Ffiu-vro.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2FOluq%22+title%3D%22Oluq+%E2%80%93+V%C3%B5ro%22+lang%3D%22fiu-vro%22+hreflang%3D%22fiu-vro%22+class%3D%22interlanguage-link-target%22%3EV%C3%B5ro%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli+class%3D%22interlanguage-link+interwiki-fj%22%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Ffj.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2FBia%22+title%3D%22Bia+%E2%80%93+Fidschi%22+lang%3D%22fj%22+hreflang%3D%22fj%22+class%3D%22interlanguage-link-target%22%3ENa+Vosa+Vakaviti%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli+class%3D%22interlanguage-link+interwiki-fo%22%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Ffo.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2F%25C3%2598l%22+title%3D%22%C3%98l+%E2%80%93+F%C3%A4r%C3%B6isch%22+lang%3D%22fo%22+hreflang%3D%22fo%22+class%3D%22interlanguage-link-target%22%3EF%C3%B8royskt%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli+class%3D%22interlanguage-link+interwiki-fr%22%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Ffr.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2FBi%25C3%25A8re%22+title%3D%22Bi%C3%A8re+%E2%80%93+Franz%C3%B6sisch%22+lang%3D%22fr%22+hreflang%3D%22fr%22+class%3D%22interlanguage-link-target%22%3EFran%C3%A7ais%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli+class%3D%22interlanguage-link+interwiki-fur%22%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Ffur.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2FBire%22+title%3D%22Bire+%E2%80%93+Friaulisch%22+lang%3D%22fur%22+hreflang%3D%22fur%22+class%3D%22interlanguage-link-target%22%3EFurlan%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli+class%3D%22interlanguage-link+interwiki-fy%22%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Ffy.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2FBier%22+title%3D%22Bier+%E2%80%93+Westfriesisch%22+lang%3D%22fy%22+hreflang%3D%22fy%22+class%3D%22in eria%3C%2Fli%3E%0A%3Cli%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fw%2Findex.php%3Ftitle%3DUrmetazoa%26amp%3Baction%3Dedit%26amp%3Bredlink%3D1%22+class%3D%22new%22+title%3D%22Urmetazoa+%28Seite+nicht+vorhanden%29%22%3EUrmetazoa%3C%2Fa%3E+%E2%80%93+Synonym+zu+Metazoa%3C%2Fli%3E%0A%3C%2Ful%3E%0A%3Cp%3EH%C3%A4ufig+wird+%3Ci%3EAnimalia%3C%2Fi%3E+als+Synonym+zu+%3Ci%3EMetazoa%3C%2Fi%3E+benutzt.+Die+ein-+bis+wenigzelligen+Choanoflagellata+werden+demzufolge+nicht+als+echte+Tiere+betrachtet%2C+sondern+als+%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fwiki%2FSchwestergruppe%22+title%3D%22Schwestergruppe%22%3ESchwestergruppe%3C%2Fa%3E+zu+den+Animalia%2FMetazoa.+Das+%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fwiki%2FMonophylum%22+class%3D%22mw-redirect%22+title%3D%22Monophylum%22%3EMonophylum%3C%2Fa%3E%2C+das+Choanoflagellata+und+Metazoa+zusammenfasst%2C+tr%C3%A4gt+dann+keinen+Namen.%3C%2Fp%3E%0A%3Ch2%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22mw-headline%22+id%3D%22Rechtsstellung_.28Deutschland.29%22%3ERechtsstellung+%28Deutschland%29%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fh2%3E%0A%3Cp%3EIn+der+Tradition+des+%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fwiki%2FR%25C3%25B6misches_Recht%22+title%3D%22R%C3%B6misches+Recht%22%3Er%C3%B6mischen+Rechts%3C%2Fa%3E+galten+Tiere+zivilrechtlich+lange+Zeit+als+Sachen.+In+Deutschland+wurden+sie+1990+mit+der+Einf%C3%BCgung+von+%C2%A7+90a+im+%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fwiki%2FB%25C3%25BCrgerliches_Gesetzbuch%22+title%3D%22B%C3%BCrgerliches+Gesetzbuch%22%3EB%C3%BCrgerlichen+Gesetzbuch%3C%2Fa%3E+gegen%C3%BCber+den+Sachen+abgeteilt%2C+unterliegen+aber+im+Allgemeinen+weiterhin+den+sachenrechtlichen+Bestimmungen.+In+%C3%96sterreich+war+eine+vergleichbare+Novellierung+bereits+1988+mit+%C2%A7+285a+ABGB+wirksam+geworden%2C+in+der+Schweiz+erfolgte+sie+1993+mit+dem+Art.+641a+ZGB.+Der+deutsche+%C2%A7+90a+BGB+lautet%3A%3C%2Fp%3E%0A%3Cdiv+class%3D%22Vorlage_Zitat%22+style%3D%22margin%3A1em+40px%3B%22%3E%0A%3Cdiv+style%3D%22margin%3A1em+0%3B%22%3E%0A%3Cblockquote+style%3D%22margin%3A0%3B%22%3E%0A%3Cp%3E%E2%80%9ETiere+sind+keine+Sachen.+Sie+werden+durch+besondere+Gesetze+gesch%C3%BCtzt.+Auf+sie+sind+die+f%C3%BC ire%22+title%3D%22Bire+%E2%80%93+Friaulisch%22+lang%3D%22fur%22+hreflang%3D%22fur%22+class%3D%22interlanguage-link-target%22%3EFurlan%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli+class%3D%22interlanguage-link+interwiki-fy%22%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Ffy.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2FBier%22+title%3D%22Bier+%E2%80%93+Westfriesisch%22+lang%3D%22fy%22+hreflang%3D%22fy%22+class%3D%22interlanguage-link-target%22%3EFrysk%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli+class%3D%22interlanguage-link+interwiki-ga%22%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fga.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2FBeoir%22+title%3D%22Beoir+%E2%80%93+Irisch%22+lang%3D%22ga%22+hreflang%3D%22ga%22+class%3D%22interlanguage-link-target%22%3EGaeilge%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli+class%3D%22interlanguage-link+interwiki-gan%22%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fgan.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2F%25E5%2595%25A4%25E9%2585%2592%22+title%3D%22%E5%95%A4%E9%85%92+%E2%80%93+Gan%22+lang%3D%22gan%22+hreflang%3D%22gan%22+class%3D%22interlanguage-link-target%22%3E%E8%B4%9B%E8%AA%9E%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli+class%3D%22interlanguage-link+interwiki-gd%22%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fgd.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2FLeann%22+title%3D%22Leann+%E2%80%93+Schottisches+G%C3%A4lisch%22+lang%3D%22gd%22+hreflang%3D%22gd%22+class%3D%22interlanguage-link-target%22%3EG%C3%A0idhlig%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli+class%3D%22interlanguage-link+interwiki-gl%22%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fgl.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2FCervexa%22+title%3D%22Cervexa+%E2%80%93+Galicisch%22+lang%3D%22gl%22+hreflang%3D%22gl%22+class%3D%22interlanguage-link-target%22%3EGalego%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli+class%3D%22interlanguage-link+interwiki-gn%22%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fgn.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2FKaguyj%25C3%25BAi%22+title%3D%22Kaguyj%C3%BAi+%E2%80%93+Guarani%22+lang%3D%22gn%22+hreflang%3D%22gn%22+class%3D%22interlanguage-link-target%22%3EAva%C3%B1e%27%E1%BA%BD%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli+class%3D%22interlanguage-link+interwiki-got%22%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fgot.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2F%25F0%2590%258C%25B0%25F0%2590%258C%25BB%25F0%259 immer+der+so+genannte+%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fwiki%2FMaschinencode%22+class%3D%22mw-redirect%22+title%3D%22Maschinencode%22%3EMaschinencode%3C%2Fa%3E+%E2%80%93+jene+Abfolge+von+Zahlen%2C+mit+der+der+Computer+auch+tats%C3%A4chlich+gesteuert+wird.%3C%2Fp%3E%0A%3Ch2%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22mw-headline%22+id%3D%22Geschichte%22%3EGeschichte%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fh2%3E%0A%3Ch3%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22mw-headline%22+id%3D%22Die_Vorl.C3.A4ufer_des_modernen_Computers%22%3EDie+Vorl%C3%A4ufer+des+modernen+Computers%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fh3%3E%0A%3Cp%3EDie+Computertechnologie+entwickelte+sich+im+Vergleich+zu+anderen+Elektroger%C3%A4ten+sehr+schnell.+Die+Geschichte+der+Entwicklung+des+Computers+reicht+zur%C3%BCck+bis+in+die+Antike+und+ist+damit+wesentlich+l%C3%A4nger+als+die+Geschichte+der+modernen+Computertechnologien+und+mechanischen+bzw.+elektrischen+Hilfsmitteln+%28Rechenmaschinen+oder+%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fwiki%2FHardware%22+title%3D%22Hardware%22%3EHardware%3C%2Fa%3E%29.+Sie+umfasst+dabei+auch+die+Entwicklung+von+Rechenmethoden%2C+die+etwa+f%C3%BCr+einfache+Schreibger%C3%A4te+auf+Papier+und+Tafeln+entwickelt+wurden.+Im+Folgenden+wird+entsprechend+versucht%2C+einen+%C3%9Cberblick+%C3%BCber+diese+Entwicklungen+zu+geben.%3C%2Fp%3E%0A%3Ch4%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22mw-headline%22+id%3D%22Zahlen_als_Grundlage_der_Computergeschichte%22%3EZahlen+als+Grundlage+der+Computergeschichte%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fh4%3E%0A%3Cp%3EDas+Konzept+der+%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fwiki%2FZahl%22+title%3D%22Zahl%22%3EZahlen%3C%2Fa%3E+l%C3%A4sst+sich+auf+keine+konkreten+Wurzeln+zur%C3%BCckf%C3%BChren+und+hat+sich+wahrscheinlich+mit+den+ersten+Notwendigkeiten+der+%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fwiki%2FKommunikation%22+title%3D%22Kommunikation%22%3EKommunikation%3C%2Fa%3E+zwischen+zwei+Individuen+entwickelt.+Man+findet+in+allen+bekannten+%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fwiki%2FSprache%22+title%3D%22Sprache%22%3ESprachen%3C%2Fa%3E+mindestens+f%C3%BCr+die+Zahlen+%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fwiki%2FEins%22+title%3D%22Eins%22%3Eeins%3C%2Fa%3E+und+%3Ca+href%3D%22%2Fwiki%2FZwei%22+title%3D%
